Node.definition: = action by which humans supervise, direct or oversee work (such as building or repairing) or worship (such as singing or playing instruments)
meaning unknown; possibly: = musical term; or: = musical instrument; or: = melody; ≈ possibly associated with the winepress (גַּת) or with the town of Gath (גַּת)
= man; ◄ son of Berechiah (בֶּרֶכְיָהוּ) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► temple singer; time of king David (דָּוִד)
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= state in which a person, supernatural being, animal, substance, or force has the ability to exert great force
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

= man, also known as Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) ◄ second son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) ► one of the patriarchs of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) in poetic texts often used as a reference to the entire people of Israel
literally: to lift up (words); hence: = action by which humans utter certain words
poetic term: = words set to music

= musical instrument, consisting of a membrane, usually of animal skin, which was stretched over a shallow circular, triangular, or square frame; ► it was struck sharply with one or two hands, depending on where it was situated; it could be held in one hand, under the arm, or against the chest and struck with the other hand, or it could be held on the knees or the ground and struck with one or two hands; the fingers of one hand could be used to tighten or loosen the tension on the membrane as it was struck

= musical instrument consisting of a sound box ◄ made of wood, out of the ends or sides of which projected two arms; the arms supported a crosspiece; strings descended from the crosspiece over the sound box and the number of strings could vary; ► often used to accompany singing
= state in which a person or object has qualities that inspire love and appreciation
exact meaning unsure; probably: = a soundbox made of wood with strings of animal intestines stretched over the top, parallel to the soundbox
= action by which humans blow air into a wind instrument and so produce a signal
= religious celebration at the appearance of the new moon, i.e. at the beginning of the month
= a musical instrument ◄ made from a ram's horn; ► sound is produced by blowing into the small end; ► used for giving signals and during festivals and celebrations
= the day when the moon was in full shine; ≈ marked with religious celebrations

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= celebration, usually of a religious nature; ≈ associated with joy
= a pattern of behavior required by somebody in authority

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
literally: a ruling or decision; hence: = a law or ordinance handed down by a ruler or a deity that a particular group of people is expected to obey
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

= man, also known as Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) ◄ second son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) ► one of the patriarchs of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) in poetic texts often used as a reference to the entire people of Israel
= man; ◄ eleventh son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and first son of Rachel (רָחֵל) ► father of Ephraim (אֶפְרַיִם) and Manasseh (מְנַשֶּׁה) each founder of a tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= causative action by which humans or deities cause an event to happen ◄ as if it were an object placed in a certain position

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name

Node.gloss: to know how|to be skilful at
Node.definition: literally: to know; hence: = state in which humans have the experience, skill, and expertise to carry out a particular activity
= process by which humans suffer hardship, ◄ described as a heavy burden that one is forced to carry
= the upper part of the human body between the head and the chest; ≈ associated with heavy burdens, and, in a more figurative way, heave responsibilities

literally: palm of the hand, but used in a figurative sense with the focus on the activities that are performed with one's hands; = someone's actions, whether or not performed with one's hands, for which one is personally responsible
= container ◄ made out of woven material such as grass or reeds; ► used for storing and/or carrying objects
= a process by which humans go through extremely difficult circumstances, resulting in severe anxiety, ◄ as if one were confined to a narrow and cramped space from which there is no escape
= action by which humans or deities speak with a loud voice, often to draw attention to themselves or to their situation and expecting someone to respond in one way or another
= causative action by which deities bring humans out of a dangerous situation
= action in which humans or deities respond to a question or situation, either by words or by actions
= state in which people, animals, or objects are in a location where they cannot be readily seen or where danger cannot reach them

= action by which humans or deities examine the character of other humans or deities by having them engage in a certain activity, ◄ as a goldsmith tests the quality of a precious metal by smelting it in the fire
= action by which a person or deity informs someone with a favorable or unfavorable message about something about to happen

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

Node.gloss: if only ... (I would be so happy!)
Node.definition: = particle marking an event that one wishes to happen
= generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= state in which an object is considered as not belonging to a certain group of objects
= action by which humans lay themselves down on the ground in front of another human or a deity, ► as an act of submission or respect
= generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= state in which something is associated with a nation or country that is different from one's own
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= causative action by which humans or deities cause (other) humans or objects to go to a place that is situated at a higher elevation, by foot or carried by hand, or with the help of a vehicle

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name
= action by which humans open their mouth widely in order to put out one's tongue, to be fed, or to shout
= an opening in the lower part of the face of humans and animals through which food and air are taken and vocal sounds are emitted
= causative action by which someone causes a certain location, container, or surface to be filled or covered with so many objects that little or no space is left

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

Node.gloss: to accept|to want to have something to do with
Node.definition: = state in which someone is willing to accept and associate with another person or with God
= action by which humans or deities stop caring for (other) humans or objects as if that person or object has been sent away from their presence
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
= process by which humans or deities follow a certain pattern of behavior, ◄ which is described as their journey through life
= action by which humans exercise their minds to determine how they are going to achieve a particular purpose

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
literally: road; hence: = pattern of behavior, with a primary focus on moral and ethical behavior, ◄ understood as a journey through life
= process by which humans or deities follow a certain pattern of behavior, ◄ which is described as their journey through life
= relatively low frequency of events or short duration of an event
= person who has a conflict with someone else and acts accordingly
literally: to humble; hence: = causative process by which humans or deities bring (other) humans and areas under their authority and control, usually using force
primarily used in poetry: = person that opposes other people and so is a cause of distress to others
literally: to turn (one's) hand (against someone); hence: = action by which deities take action against humans, usually involving acts of punishment
literally: to turn (one's) hand against (someone else); hence: = action by which humans or deities engage in an act of violence against (other) humans
= state in which humans or deities experience hostility towards a person, an object, or a practice
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= action by which someone recognizes someone else's superiority, ◄ described as diminishing oneself before this person
= a range of important events happening in a certain period of time
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future

Node.gloss: to make (someone) eat|to give (someone) to eat
Node.definition: = action by which someone gives other people food for consumption, sometimes with the added connotation that these people are actually forced to consume it; with or without explicit object
= pertaining to being the best part of an object or the best among a range of objects
= cereal plant bearing dense four sided spike of grain; ◄ Triticum; ► important source of flour for bread; ≈ its color used to be regarded as the ideal color for the skin
= mass of rock projecting and forming an elevation
= sweet substance ◄ made either by bees, or from fruits such as dates, grapes or figs; ► much appreciated as food; ≈ associated with abundance and fertility
= causative process by which humans or deities cause the desire of (other) humans to be fulfilled
